titles.title: Save Our Students Act
Save Our Students Act
A bill to amend title 32, United States Code, to authorize National Guard support for State and local efforts to keep schools safe from violence, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Save Our Students Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Defense (DOD) to provide funds to states submitting specified plans for the National Guard to supplement state and local efforts to keep schools safe from violence.
